name: FINIGARD 111
description: FINIGARD 111 is a specially formulated organo-mineral liquid concentrate. It is used to impart increased corrosion protection and torque tension modification to parts processed with COVENTYA FINIDIP or LANTHANE conversion coatings. Developed to meet the demands of the automotive industry, FINIGARD 111 protects Zinc and Zinc alloy finishes against corrosion in a variety of environments. The process is suitable for bulk electroplating applications and can be used in conjunction with hexavalent chromates or trivalent passivates.
